text: - I'm Madhukar Kumar.

I'm the Chief Marketing
Officer at SingleStore.

How is generative AI
impacting our industry?

Well, first of all, we believe
that large language models
are getting more and more commoditized.

So the true differentiator
is really the data.
And our industry is all about data,
so we have started to see now

how companies are really
utilizing the power of data

to differentiate what they're
building with generative AIs.

The biggest misconception
about generative AI

is that all AI is gonna
take over most of the jobs.
The reality is that more people
would be able to do other things with AI,
and people who effectively use AI

will take away most of
the repetitive jobs.
But I also believe that generative AI

will open up brand new
industry of jobs, so to speak.
Security, governance, safety, all of this
is table stakes for enterprises,

which is where we typically
work with in terms of databases.
And that's one of the things
that we have started to see this year,

is last year a lot of companies
were doing experiments.

But to truly take advantage
of AI and enterprises,

you have to take into
account the governance,
the privacy, as well as access of the data

and who is allowed to use
that data in the right way.
So I feel that's the direction.

That's where all enterprise
AI is headed towards.
Both AWS as well as SingleStore,
they're very close partners.

And in fact, AWS is one
of our favorite partners
because they provide the scalable
and the necessary infrastructure needed,

along with SingleStore,
to provide enterprises
all the tools they need to build
generative AI applications for production.
AWS helps my company to be more scalable
and more developer friendly.
(bright upbeat music)
